꿈보다 해몽이 낫으다.

꿈보다 해몽이 나으다.

```         
Interpretation of dreams is better than dreams.

꿈보다 해몽이 좋네요

```

## Mom's Interpretation

Mom had a way of keeping good things as they were 
And turning bad things into good,

Same with dreams
She could re-interpret any and all dreams
Her interpretation was always positive.
